name: LitLab
description: A concept full stack application for a real time online collaboration platform for writers. Chat and collaborate with other creative writers and make amazing stories all in real time!

name: Remember The Mon
description: A memory game built with React. This is based on the popular Pokemon franchise and primarily revolves around changing state.
